DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study prospectively compare pain functional outcome patient chronic lateral epicondylitis treat either intratendinous corticosteroid injection high energy extracorporeal shock wave therapy ( ESWT ) .
DOC.brief_title: Corticosteroid Injection Verses High Energy Extracorporeal Shock Wave Therapy Lateral Epicondylitis
DOC.detailed_description: Corticosteroid injection high energy ESWT standard therapy lateral epicondylitis Walter Reed National Military Medical Center . While corticosteroid injection show moderately effective short term condition , significant minority patient remain symptomatic . Low energy ESWT mixed result orthopaedic literature , date study specifically examine effect high energy ESWT . The investigator plan randomize total 80 patient diagnosis lateral epicondylitis either corticosteroid injection high energy ESWT , follow total 12 month . Primary outcomes Disabilities Arm , Shoulder , Hand ( DASH ) score , Patient Reported Tennis Elbow Evaluation ( PRTEE ) score , Mayo Elbow Score , Veterans Rand-36 , return-to-work status . Patients survey baseline , 6 week , 3 month , 6 month . All assessment do independent physician examiner blind treatment receive .
DOC.criteria: All patient present WRNMMC orthopaedic hand surgery clinic complaint lateral elbow pain evaluated inclusion study . Inclusions criterion : Clinical diagnosis lateral epicondylitis base primary complaint lateral elbow pain either ( ) tenderness lateral epicondyle direct palpation , ( b ) exacerbation pain lateral elbow resist dorsiflexion wrist Failure previous trial nonoperative management least 4wks duration ( include rest/light duty , non steroidal antiinflammatory drug , physical/occupational therapy , home stretch regimen ) Age < 18yo Pregnant planning become pregnant study period ( base verbal question ) Steroid treatment ( oral injectable ) within previous 3mo Diagnosis ipsilateral compressive neuropathy Allergy Kenalog , lidocaine , conductive ultrasound gel Diagnosis inflammatory arthropathy rheumatoid condition Diagnosis fibromyalgia , chronic fatigue syndrome , complex regional pain syndrome , chronic widespread pain syndrome
